bronze:ShapeFactory.NAME: Фабрика дронов
DESCRIPTIONS: Вы натыкаетесь на одну из нерабочих фабрик Преддверий по производству дронов. Удивительно, но панель управления всё ещё в рабочем состоянии. Если запустить и разобрать некоторые из этих существ, похожих на машины, вы можете унаследовать часть их оружия.
Ни один из этих дроном не имеет того, что вам могло бы пригодиться.

bronze:AncientFactory.NAME: Ancient Factory
DESCRIPTIONS: As you continue your tireless descent, you have come across the ~original~ factory. You remember being here for your own assembly, when you met the ~Maker~ for the first time. NL Each one of the ancient constructs they created is as #yperfect as yourself. There are parts from the old prototypes that could be of use to you, but it will require activating them.
Even for unfinished prototypes, they are still formidable - no need for unnecessary risks.
Вы решаете воспользоваться кузницей и... NL #y@ДЗЫНЬ@ #y@ДЗЫ-Ы-ЫНЬ@ #y@ДЗЫНЬ!@ NL ...усиливаете свой арсенал новыми улучшениями и сервоприводами.

bronze:CrystalForge.NAME: Grim Forge
DESCRIPTIONS: Through secret passages known only to the Constructs of the Spire, you enter a chamber designed for maintenance and repairs on Automaton models. The tools available here will be of certain use to you.
With the magic tongs, you carefully embed a weapon directly into your core. #y@Bzzzt!@ Seems like coding yourself is not as easy as you thought.
Using the enchanted anvil, you smash a precious piece of equipment into pieces, just to forge them into a burst of pure energy. It ~merges~ ~into~ ~your~ ~form,~ filling you with warmth and strength.

The Forge's ability to transmute matter is put to use immediately as you toss in an unneeded piece of equipment. Some moments later, the material dissolves and compresses into a new enhancement for your armor.
You escape through the same secret passage you came in, leaving the Grim Forge behind you. Your journey continues towards the Dawn awaiting at the top of the Spire.
